title: Reliance Cap resolution: NCLT to hear IIHL plea for deadline extension on June 20
description: The National Company Law Tribunal (NCLT) will hear a plea from Hinduja Group firm IIHL on June 20 for an extension of the deadline to complete Reliance Capital's resolution. IIHL, the successful bidder for Reliance Capital, seeks a 90-day extension beyond the May 27, 2024 deadline set by NCLT Mumbai for completing the Rs 9,650-crore resolution plan. Reliance Capital, the financial services arm of Anil Ambani Group, had its board superseded by the RBI in November 2021, and IIHL's resolution plan was approved by NCLT in February 2024.
